diseases.name: Healthy
diseases.description: The crop is healthy with no signs of disease.

diseases.name: Powdery Mildew
diseases.description: A fungal disease that appears as white powdery spots on leaves.

diseases.name: Rust
diseases.description: A fungal infection characterized by reddish-brown pustules on leaves.
solutions: Apply fungicides early in the season.

diseases.name: Not Plant
diseases.description: The uploaded image does not contain a plant.
